profile_1_line: My name is Amine BEN ZAGGAGH, {Age} years old and I'm a full-stack software engineer based in {City}, {Country}.
profile_2_line: I write code and develop web and mobile applications for both iOS and Android operating system.
profile_3_line: I focus on writing clean, elegant and efficient code.
profile_4_line: I love programming 👨‍💻, traveling, playing darts 🎯 and reading books!
profile_5_line: On my previous work experience, I was a full-stack software developer at Docaposte working on the Tribunal Digital.
profile_6_line: I really enjoyed working with them. At the same time, sometimes I had to put my work first, and make sure that I completed what I needed to do. So, I would say that they would describe me as disciplined, but friendly and supportive..
skills_front_end_line: In front-end development, my current stack involves HTML with CSS and SASS, and Angular and React frameworks.
skills_back_end_line: In back-end development, my current stack involves mainly Java 8 with the Spring framework, and alternatively Node JS with Express or PHP using Laravel.
